creator: From Now On
descriptionHtml:
The Belmont Bruins application is your home for all things athletics at Belmont University! Whether you’re on campus or on the go, this app is a must-have for ALL Bruins fans.

Features of the Belmont Bruins app include:
+ Game Schedules
+ Team Records/Info
+ Roster Information
+ Video
+ Notifications
+ Social Feed/News
+ Special Offers

The Belmont Bruins app requests the use of location services to provide attendees with location based messaging. Additionally, this app uses notifications to keep you informed of events and offers from Belmont University. You can manage your settings and opt-out of these features at any time.

Go Bruins!
